description: This course is designed for students who plan to take courses for which calculus is a prerequisite, and need additional preparation before taking calculus. The course emphasizes functions, including polynomial, exponential, logarithmic, and trigonometric. Other topics include interpretation of graphs and charts, unit analysis, and problem solving methods. Students must have permission of the Director of Mathematics Placement to enroll. Offered Fall Semester only.
name: Preparation for Calculus
